original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākaccāno bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya kāyagatāya satiyā ajjhattaṁ parimukhaṁ sūpaṭṭhitāya.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ bhagavataḥ avidūre nisinnaḥ hoti pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya kāya gatāya satiyā ajjhattam parimukham su upaṭṭhitāya

original: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ avidūre nisinnaṁ pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya kāyagatāya satiyā ajjhattaṁ parimukhaṁ sūpaṭṭhitāya.
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavā āyasmantam mahākaccānam avidūre nisinnam pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya kāya gatāya satiyā ajjhattam parimukham su upaṭṭhitāya

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: No cassa no ca me siyā,
analyzed: no ca assa no ca me siyā

original: Na bhavissati na ca me bhavissati;
analyzed: na bhavissati na ca me bhavissati
